text: Danville is a city of Kentucky in the United States. In 2012 it was the place where Vice President Joe Biden debated Congressman Paul Ryan. ==Sources== ==Further reading== * * ==Other websites== * City of Danville official website * Danville-Boyle County Convention and Visitors Bureau * Danville, Boyle County Chamber of Commerce * Danville/Boyle County Economic Development Partnership Category:Cities in Kentucky Category:County seats in Kentucky
title: Danville, Kentucky
